headline: Carrier unveils data center strategy, growth in Q4 HVAC sales
summary: HVAC in the Americas supplied about 40% of the company’s orders. Carrier plans to expand output to meet rising demand, CEO David Gitlin said.

headline: Carrier Global: Still Cheap With A Temperate Outlook
summary: Carrier Global's strategic transformation and growth potential make it a Buy, with a focus on HVAC, refrigeration, and expanding margins. Explore more details here.
